attacks.name: Mach Punch
attacks.effect: Does 10 damage to 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

attacks.name: Mega Bravo
attacks.effect: Discard all Fire Energy attached to Infernape. This attack does 40 damage times the amount of Fire Energy you discarded.
